name: Fast Truck Racing Furious Demolition Derby Crash
name_original: Fast Truck Racing Furious Demolition Derby Crash
description:
Fast Truck Racing Furious Demolition Derby Crash

Fast Truck Racing offers a simple yet challenging gameplay to all ages!
Be the first to experience Truck Racing in the most realistic way.
Fast Truck Racing presents a beautiful 3D map, realistic game physics and challenging levels that you don’t want to stop playing!
It is not Easy to Collect Flag from ground because there are lots of other Master player in this game.
once you collect your flag go at your destination and drop the flag,and go to collect the other flag,be accurate because other enemy trucks

are going to collect that flag so be quick and collect first.
They are Expert & Professional in this match.This is different Game From Many of other Survivor Games & Monster Truck, Monster Car,

Jeep, Military War Tank racing games.
Challenge yourself with the multilevel gameplay and be the only survivor in the end!

Key features:

- Realistic simulation
- Killer Monster
- Speed challenger
